content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my property, Juan. I understand that you are looking for a 25 square meter apartment in New York. I am willing to negotiate with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. May I ask what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. I am not willing to pay more than 1000 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I see. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in New York, I would be able to offer you a rental price of 1000 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and other expenses associated with the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 1000 Euros.

Let's sign the contract now.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great, Juan. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. Before we sign the contract, I would like to clarify a few things. The rental price of 1000 Euros per month is for a 25 square meter apartment in New York, which is a very small and affordable space. It may not be suitable for your needs if you require more space or amenities. Additionally, please note that this price is subject to change based on market conditions and other factors. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
